actions.name: Anionic
actions.description: Effect: If there is at least one other allied creature with the Plus, Cationic or Minus Ability on the field, the user's SPDEF stat is increased by 50%. If the user is within 5m of an ally with the Plus, Cationic, or Minus Ability, they gain the effect of that Ability.
